title: Worked Solution
text:
To solve for 𝑚, we first need to simplify the left side of the equation:

(2/3)(3𝑚-6) $$=$$ 2𝑚 - $$4$$

Substituting this into the original equation, we get:

2𝑚 - $$4$$ $$=$$ $$5$$ - 𝑚

Simplifying and rearranging, we get:

3𝑚 $$=$$ $$9$$

𝑚 $$=$$ $$3$$

Therefore, the solution is 𝑚 $$=$$ $$3$$.
